ffmpeg_required: Module-ka `{{module_name}}` wuxuu u baahan yahay **FFmpeg** inuu shaqeeyo. Fadlan ka rakib bogga rasmiga ah: - [https://ffmpeg.org](https://ffmpeg.org) Haddii aadan u baahnayn sifadan, waxaad curyaamin kartaa module-kan qaybta **Automation Programs**, ama adigoo gujinaya badhanka hoose.
